abstract: When residents of a polluted village went to complain to the government, an official appeared to be so drunk that he was not able to offer much of a response, Henan Television reported. The display was captured on video and posted online.

headline.main: After Appearing Drunk on Television, Chinese Official Faces Inquiry

snippet: When residents of a polluted village went to complain to the government, an official appeared to be so drunk that he was not able to offer much of a response, Henan Television reported. The display was captured on video and posted online.
